name: mymeetups
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my meetups
Developer Terms of Use
des:
My meetup is the unofficial skill that allows you to interact with Meetup.com. This skill allows you to discover events, get recommended events, find events in a given city or date, and get details about meetup events. 
This skill also allows you to RSVP to events that are free or don't require payment at the time of RSVP. You'll need to use the Meetup app or site to sign-up for events that require an RSVP fee at the time of sign-up.
Give it a try - say Alexa, ask my meetups to get recommendations for this weekend.

More sample utterances:
Alexa give me events for San Francisco
Alexa recommend events in New York
Give me upcoming LGBTQ events in Portland
Get events for this week

If you have feedback for the skill, please use the "Having Trouble With This Skill" button at the bottom of the skill page. We'll use your feedback to improve the experience.
